title: Faerûn
summary: Faerûn /feɪˈruːn/ is a fictional continent, the primary setting of the Dungeons & Dragons world of Forgotten Realms. It is described in detail in several editions of the Forgotten Realms Campaign Setting (first published in 1987 by TSR, Inc.) with the most recent being the 5th edition from Wizards of the Coast,[1][2] and various locales and aspects are described in more depth in separate campaign setting books.[3] Around a hundred novels and several computer and video games use Faerûn as the setting.
